Programa de Modernização Fiscal do Estado da Paraíba - PROFISCO Paraíba

description.narrative: Mejorar la eficiencia y transparencia en la gestión fiscal del Estado de Paraiba.
To better the efficiency and the transparency of the fiscal management, aiming at incrementing the state's own revenue and in increasing the effectiveness and quality of the state dispenses.
